Game.Name: Zoids Saga II (Japan)
Game.plot: For many generations, Zoids and their proud pilots have been locked in combat for control of the planet Zi. During a recent weapons experiment, Zi underwent an accidental time-space fusion that brought together warriors from two eras: the Chaotic Century and the New Century. Now you must help Van, Fiona, Bit Cloud, and Zeru use the full power of the Zoids to bring peace to their world. You can create your own Zoids and upgrade them to perform combination attacks.Cheat: Secret ZoidsAfter you beat the game go to the title screen and enter the codes quickly, before the demo starts. (note: you can input codes more then once.)Cheat: Keep coming back.On the Northern Continent there's a city called McCulley. If you head west of there, if you have Whale King or don't run into zoids, after a while you'll keep going and come back to McCulley, you shouldn't cross the ocean either, you'll stay mainly on land.
